title: Plainlegal Officially Becomes Alt Legal Today, Rebranding Reflects NYC Company’s Growth and Innovation in Cloud-based IP Management
text:
Alt Legal, Inc. 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Plainlegal , an intellectual property (IP) management software-as-a-service company based in New York City, becomes Alt Legal today, the culmination of a comprehensive rebranding effort. Plainlegal clients, law firms and corporate legal departments, have already been migrated to Alt Legal’s domain so they will have no interruption or change in their software due to the rebranding process. 
Founder and CEO Nehal Madhani comments: “Plainlegal has had incredible success simplifying the preparation and management of IP for lawyers. However, because our company has grown and evolved significantly, we needed to rebrand. As of today, we are officially Alt Legal, a name which reflects our commitment to pioneering an alternative way for intellectual property professionals to practice IP law.” 
He further explains: “We don’t believe in offering expensive legacy software, requiring long-term contracts or charging extra fees for technology, training, support or data migration. Alt Legal's innovative software automates IP docketing to eliminate repetitive work and prevent missed filing deadlines. We will continue to provide the same powerful, intuitive software backed by exceptional customer support.” 
About Alt Legal, Inc. 
Alt Legal, Inc. is a New York City-based legal software company started by Nehal Madhani, a lawyer who left a top-tier international law firm, Kirkland & Ellis, taught himself programming, and created Alt Legal (previously known as Plainlegal). Alt Legal’s intuitive, easy-to-use cloud-based software provides IP docketing, management and document assembly tools for IP lawyers filing trademarks, patents and copyrights. 
Alt Legal’s software is trusted by Am Law 200 firms, IP boutiques, and in-house legal departments to handle thousands of filings every day. Alt Legal automatically updates case statuses and deadlines, seamlessly collects key client details, and instantly generates IP filings. For more information, visit http://www.altlegal.com or follow us on Twitter @altlegalhq .
